title: Top IT firms expect double-digit sales growth; Wipro, Tech M to lead revenue performance - Economic Times
content: Top IT firms expect double-digit sales growth; Wipro, Tech M to lead revenue performance  Economic Times
description: The financial results season will kick start next week with Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) on Monday (April 11), followed by Infosys (April 13), and HCL Technologies and Wipro later in the month.
